mapper.insert: insert into order_item (id, order_info_id, goods_id, goods_sku_id, goods_sku_code, goods_name, sale_properties, goods_gross_weight, purchase_quantity, purchase_price, promotion_activity_id, goods_length, goods_width, goods_height, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{goodsSkuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{goodsSkuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saleProperties,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsGrossWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{purchaseQuantity,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{purchasePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{promotionActivityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{goodsLength,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{goodsWidth,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{goodsHeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update order_item set order_info_id = #{orderInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, goods_sku_id = #{goodsSkuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, goods_sku_code = #{goodsSkuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sale_properties = #{saleProperties,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_gross_weight = #{goodsGrossWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, purchase_quantity = #{purchaseQuantity,jdbcType=BIGINT}, purchase_price = #{purchasePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, promotion_activity_id = #{promotionActivityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, goods_length = #{goodsLength,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, goods_width = #{goodsWidth,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, goods_height = #{goodsHeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, order_info_id, goods_id, goods_sku_id, goods_sku_code, goods_name, sale_properties, goods_gross_weight, purchase_quantity, purchase_price, promotion_activity_id, goods_length, goods_width, goods_height, gmt_create, gmt_modified from order_item where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
